td.content: 2 cm retroperitoneal soft tissue mass obscuring the left psoas muscle
shows a heterogeneously enhancing proximal jejunal mass with central calcifications

td.content: s:a white female optician aged 55 yrs c/o 3 weeks h/o moderate lower abdominal pain. NKDA. she drinks alcohol occasionally she has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking o:Height 62 in, Weight 159 lbs, Temperature 99.1 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Oxaliplatin - 85 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 200 mg IV, FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg bolus, and ordered CT Abdomen.

s:a white f optician aged 57 ys presents with moderate lower abdominal pain. pt also reports moderate diarrhea, moderate wheezing associated with food intake. o:Height 61 in, Weight 152 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 103, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

s:pt presents with 16 months history of moderate wheezing associated with food intake. patient also reports increased frequency of moderate lower abdominal pain, moderate diarrhea. patient is a white F aged 57 yrs. o:Height 61 in, Weight 153 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered CT Small Bowel, 5-HIAA, 24hr U, serotonin.

Value.Value: ordered CT Small Bowel , 5 - HIAA , 24 hr U , serotonin
